title: When the screen on my Pixel 4a is active and I get a call, I can't answer it.
content: When the screen on my Pixel 4a is active and I get a call, I can't answer it. A box appears with decline, screen, and answer buttons, but only decline works. I have tried the notifications setting, but that didn't work. The do not disturb function is not turned on.  If the screen is not active, I can answer by swiping.  Any ideas?
